src:
Ini Kunci MU Raih Tiga Kemenangan Beruntung
01 Nov 2019, 20:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manajer Manchester United, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer angkat bicara terkait tren positif Setan Merah belakangan ini. Solskjaer menyebut bahwa salah satu kunci timnya berhasil bangkit karena faktor kepercayaan diri dan juga keberuntungan.
Manchester United sendiri sempat menunjukkan performa yang mencemaskan di awal musim ini. Mereka sempat berada di dekat zona degradasi setelah hanya mampu meraih dua kemenangan dari sembilan laga perdana EPL.
Namun sejak jeda internasional kemarin, peruntungan United mulai berubah. Diawali dengan hasil imbang 1-1 melawan Liverpool, Setan Merah berhasil meraih tiga kemenangan beruntun melawan Partizan Belgrade, Norwich City dan Chelsea.
Solskjaer mengakui bahwa ada sedikit elemen keberuntungan dari tren positif mereka belakangan ini. "Itulah sepakbola, terkadang hasil akhir ditentukan dari faktor keberuntungan," ujar Solskjaer yang dikutip Manchester Evening News.

Baca komentar lengkap manajer 46 tahun tersebut di bawah ini.
text:
This is the Key MU Wins Three Lucky Victories
Nov 1 2019, 20:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer has spoken out about the recent positive trends of the Red Devils. Solskjaer said that one of the keys to his team managed to rise because of self-confidence and luck.
Manchester United itself had shown an alarming performance at the beginning of this season. They had been near the relegation zone after only being able to achieve two wins from nine inaugural EPL games.
But since the international break yesterday, United's fortune began to change. Starting with a 1-1 draw against Liverpool, the Red Devils won three consecutive wins against Partizan Belgrade, Norwich City and Chelsea.
Solskjaer acknowledged that there was little luck in their recent positive trend. "That's football, sometimes the final result is determined by luck," Solskjaer was quoted as saying by the Manchester Evening News.

Read the full comments of the 46-year-old manager below.
